headline: Keurig Reported to Regulators for Deceptively Marketing K-Cups as Recyclable
summary: TINA.org Investigation Finds Widespread Greenwashing TINA.org Logo for Ad Watchdog MADISON, CONN., Jan. 27, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Beverage giant Keurig Dr Pepper is deceptively marketing its single-serve K-Cup pods as “recyclable” in violation of state and federal laws, according to an investigation by truthinadvertising.org (TINA.org). The ad watchdog has filed complaints with the Federal Trade Commission and regulators in more than a dozen states, urging them to take enforcement action. In
